ingredients: 2 heads romaine lettuce, chopped, 2  oranges - peeled, pith removed, and cut into segments,   +   1/2 cup crumbled Gorgonzola cheese, 2  fresh figs, cut into 1-inch cubes,   +   1/4 cup vinaigrette dressing, or to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 7g 8%, Saturated Fat 4g 19%, Cholesterol 23mg 8%, Sodium 468mg 20%, Total Carbohydrate 15g 5%, Dietary Fiber 4g 15%, Total Sugars 10g, Protein 7g, Vitamin C 41mg 204%, Calcium 177mg 14%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 481mg 10%
